title: Destiny Nerfs Shotguns Again Next Week
text:
Destiny Nerfs Shotguns Again Next Week 
Published By: Gamerant.com - Yesterday 
Bungie announces that the next update for Destiny: The Taken King will nerf shotguns, removing any instance of the 'Shot Package' perk from ...
